DOC.brief_summary: Eye care professional prescribe contact lenses new wearer daily basis , common practice practitioner educate patient gradually increase contact lens wear time first day use ; however , scientific basis literature practice . This study compare ocular health comfort new contact lens wearer randomly assign begin contact lens wear increase wearing time versus immediately start full-time wear ( eight hour more/day ) . The increase wearing time group wear daily wear contact lens ( Acuvue Oasys ) two , four , six , eight , eight hour first , second , third , fourth , fifth day , respectively . The group instruct wear contact lens eight hour per day , start first day wear . Both group subject eye health comfort evaluate baseline , one , two week lighted-microscope eye comfort survey . Subjects also keep daily log eye comfort visual analog scale survey home . All subject learn wear take care contact lenses . They also receive prescription contact lenses conclusion wish continue wear study contact lenses .
DOC.criteria: Has complete comprehensive eye exam within past 6 month Able wear spherical senofilcon A contact lenses Able use OptiFree PureMoist contact lens solution Any prior contact lens use Topical eye drop within last two hour study visit Known systemic health condition know alter tear film physiology History severe ocular trauma Active ocular infection Active ocular inflammation Known hypersensitivity diagnostic eye drop Pregnant breast feeding
